name: honorable-monorepo
description: An extensible React component library for 2022 and beyond

scripts.dev:packages: npm run link:packages && (npm run dev:honorable & npm run dev:honorable-theme-default & npm run dev:honorable-theme-honorable & npm run dev:honorable-theme-material & npm run dev:honorable-theme-wireframe)
scripts.dev:designer: npm run link:designer && (cd designer && npm run start:watch)
scripts.dev:site: npm run link:site && (cd packages/honorable && npm run clean:peerDependencies) && (cd site && npm run start:watch)
scripts.dev:storybook: npm run link:storybook && (cd storybook && npm run start:watch)
scripts.link:packages: npm run link:honorable && npm run link:honorable-theme-default && npm run link:honorable-theme-honorable && npm run link:honorable-theme-material && npm run link:honorable-theme-wireframe
scripts.link:honorable-theme-honorable: (cd packages/honorable-theme-honorable && npm link && npm link honorable honorable-theme-default)
scripts.link:honorable-theme-material: (cd packages/honorable-theme-material && npm link && npm link honorable honorable-theme-default)
scripts.link:honorable-theme-wireframe: (cd packages/honorable-theme-wireframe && npm link && npm link honorable honorable-theme-default)
scripts.link:designer: (cd designer && npm link honorable honorable-theme-default honorable-theme-honorable)
scripts.link:site: (cd site && npm link honorable honorable-theme-default honorable-theme-honorable honorable-theme-material honorable-theme-wireframe)
scripts.upgrade:all: npm run upgrade:packages && npm run upgrade:designer && npm run upgrade:site && npm run upgrade:storybook
scripts.upgrade:packages: npm run upgrade:honorable-theme-default && npm run upgrade:honorable-theme-honorable && npm run upgrade:honorable-theme-material && npm run upgrade:honorable-theme-wireframe
scripts.upgrade:designer: (cd designer && npm upgrade honorable honorable-theme-default honorable-theme-honorable)
scripts.upgrade:site: (cd site && npm upgrade honorable honorable-theme-default honorable-theme-honorable honorable-theme-material honorable-theme-wireframe)
scripts.minor:honorable: (cd packages/honorable && npm version minor && npm publish)
scripts.patch:honorable: (cd packages/honorable && npm version patch && npm publish)
scripts.minor:honorable-theme-default: (cd packages/honorable-theme-default && npm version minor && npm publish)
scripts.patch:honorable-theme-default: (cd packages/honorable-theme-default && npm version patch && npm publish)
scripts.minor:honorable-theme-honorable: npm run upgrade:honorable-theme-honorable && (cd packages/honorable-theme-honorable && npm version minor && npm publish)
scripts.patch:honorable-theme-honorable: npm run upgrade:honorable-theme-honorable && (cd packages/honorable-theme-honorable && npm version patch && npm publish)
scripts.minor:honorable-theme-material: npm run upgrade:honorable-theme-material && (cd packages/honorable-theme-material && npm version minor && npm publish)
scripts.patch:honorable-theme-material: npm run upgrade:honorable-theme-material && (cd packages/honorable-theme-material && npm version patch && npm publish)
scripts.minor:honorable-theme-wireframe: npm run upgrade:honorable-theme-wireframe && (cd packages/honorable-theme-wireframe && npm version minor && npm publish)
scripts.patch:honorable-theme-wireframe: npm run upgrade:honorable-theme-wireframe && (cd packages/honorable-theme-wireframe && npm version patch && npm publish)

author: David HÃ©rault <dherault@gmail.com> (https://github.com/dherault)
